title: Oxide vacancy formation energy model
description: Random forest model to predict the formation energy of O vacancies in oxides

papers.title: Machine Learning Materials Properties with Accurate Predictions, Uncertainty Estimates, Domain Guidance, and Persistent Online Accessibility

datasets.title: Benchmark Dataset for Locating Atoms in STEM images

function_text:
@garden_entrypoint(
    metadata=model_entrypoint_meta,  
    model_connectors=[github_connector], 
    garden_doi=my_garden_doi
)
def predict_oxide_vacancy(comp_list):
    import shutil, zipfile
    import os
    import sys
    import warnings
    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
    
    if not os.path.exists('model_oxide_vacancy'):
        download_path = github_connector.stage()
        shutil.move('hf_model', 'model_oxide_vacancy')

    sys.path.append('model_oxide_vacancy')

    from predict_oxide_vacancy import make_predictions
    
    preds = make_predictions(comp_list)

    return preds
